params.subject: CAST Engineering Dashboard: Password lost
params.body:
Hi, I forgot my password. 
Can you help me getting access to the account '$login-userlost'. 
Regards.

params.subject: CAST Engineering Dashboard: Request access
params.body:
Hi, I would like to connect to the Dashboard. 
Can I have a username and password, please? 
Regards.

message: No license key has been configured for this Engineering Dashboard. Please contact your CAST administrator.
You are not authorized to access any applications
DBMS connections have failed or all domains loading have been aborted

params.subject: CAST Engineering Dashboard: Request License Key
params.body:
Hi, 

I noticed that a license key is required to be able to navigate into the Engineering Dashboard.
Can you update the license key so that we can connect officially to the ED? 
Thanks 

Regards.

params.subject: CAST Engineering Dashboard
params.body:
Hi, I want to share with you my CAST Engineering Dashboard. 
You can access it by clicking this url : $urlToShare. 
Regards.

params.subject: CAST Education: $ruleName
params.body:
Hi,

In order to communicate around good practices based on CAST rule Education feature, I am pleased to share with you Documentation and sample of violations regarding the $ruleName Rule on your Application. 

$actionText 

Do not hesitate to come back to us if you have any question.

 Documentation Section 
 You can directly access it to: $ruleDocumentationUrl 

 List of Violations 
 You can directly access it to: $violationsUrl 

  Regards,
